title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, push and manage models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama: works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI client for Ollama, featuring model management, code highlighting, RAG and multi-user support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama: retriever, generator and chat components for building RAG pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support and fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: generate, chat and manage models from Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper around the Ollama HTTP API with colored output and history.

title: OllamaSharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with Blazor sample and dependency-injection support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and persistent storage.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with docker-compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any Discord server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models directly in Slack.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama, Phi, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio async runtime and typed request/response models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama pipelines in CI/CD for model testing and deployment.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template for Ollama with session memory and model selector sidebar.
